Gov: Rick Scott's re-election campaign has repeatedly emphasized the number of Floridians who lost their jobs during Charlie Crist's term as governor.
Scott mentioned this claim multiple time: 4. The Scott campaign website cited private-sector job losses of 828,800 under Crist from January 2007 to December 2010, while Scott mentioned a slightly larger figure of 832,000 during the debate.
